remarks: Describe an implicit one-to-one onto function of two variables. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 17-Aug-2017.)
statement:
f1od2.1 $e |- F = ( x e. A , y e. B |-> C ) $.
f1od2.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) ) -> C e. W ) $.
f1od2.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ z e. D ) -> ( I e. X /\ J e. Y ) ) $.
f1od2.4 $e |- ( ph -> ( ( ( x e. A /\ y e. B ) /\ z = C ) <-> ( z e. D /\ ( x = I /\ y = J ) ) ) ) $.
f1od2 $p |- ( ph -> F : ( A X. B ) -1-1-onto-> D ) $.
$d A x y z $.
$d B x y z $.
$d C z $.
$d D x y z $.
$d I x y $.
$d J x y $.
$d ph x y z $.
